name: TheAtlantic
text: "Young Abraham Lincoln argued that defiance of the law endangers us all. His point was that one cannot claim to support the rule of law while also ignoring it," @NPRinskeep writes: https://t.co/RiWgINQeYx

name: TheAtlantic
text: "No one should feign surprise or disbelief that academics write to me with great frequency to share their anxieties. In a three-week period early this summer, I counted some 150 of these messages," @JohnHMcWhorter writes: https://t.co/KCPsIO370J

name: TheAtlantic
text: Herd immunity is a concept that guides vaccine policy to prevent outbreaks, writes @JamesHamblin. It is not an approach to ending a global pandemic. https://t.co/nfSRRCtLLX

name: TheAtlantic
text: In defeating Joe Kennedy, long-serving Massachusetts senator Ed Markey turned his biggest vulnerability into an opportunity, @russellberman writes: https://t.co/2GqP7E0S5b

name: TheAtlantic
